ðŸŽ¯ Method 4: Browser Developer Tools

  1. Open the app in your browser
  2. Press F12 to open Developer Tools
  3. Go to the "Application" tab (Chrome/Edge) or "Storage" tab (Firefox)
  4. Click "Service Workers" in the left sidebar
  5. Click "Unregister" next to the service worker
  6. Go to "Cache Storage" and delete all caches
  7. Close DevTools and refresh the page
